JobTitle: Customer Relationship Professional – Point of Sale (POS) Analyst – German Speaking
JobFullDesc:
You’ll do more than the expected. You’ll do the unexpected.
If you are passionate about delivering extraordinary service, results driven and interested in working for a world-class Global brand, then the American Express Customer Relationship Professional position may be an ideal fit for you. In this role you will provide extraordinary customer service by swiftly and accurately enabling our Merchant’s point of sale terminals, making it easy for them to do business with us and our American Express Card members
You will be working in a small, friendly and highly motivated team that has responsibility for Merchant point of sale (POS) processes for our valued German and Austrian customers. 
Key responsibilities include:

Managing work inputs/inventory in line with departmental and individual goals.
Liaison with third party partners and terminal providers
Working closely with other teams and departments within the business
Handling escalations from internal customers via email/calls
Troubleshooting issues preventing terminals from accepting American Express
Continuous process improvement; looking for ways to drive down issues and increase Merchant satisfaction

Offer of employment with American Express is conditioned upon the successful completion of a background verification check, subject to applicable laws and regulations.
Previous Merchant experience is not essential, we are looking for candidates who can demonstrate that they are:

Fluent in German and English, written and spoken
Highly self-motivated, results-oriented and positive
A team player
An excellent communicator with exceptional interpersonal skills
Ability to multi task and easily adapt to change
Enjoying working with technology; proficient keyboard skills and in navigating within a Windows environment, i.e. Excel, Word, PowerPoint and Outlook
Passionate about American Express and customer service 

Work Location:
The role will be based at our Brighton office. There may be a period of temporarily working from home depending on UK COVID-19 restrictions in place and American Express workplace safety requirements. In order to accommodate any period of working from home, the minimum requirements are:
Current minimum speed requirements are 25 mbps download x 5 mbps upload speeds, preferably through broadband cable, fibre, optic services. A secure home office, located at your confirmed address of residence, free from background nose or other distractions. Work at home is only temporary and as soon as it’s safe, you will be asked to return to the office site.
Not local to Brighton? We appreciate your willingness to relocate within the UK to meet business needs along with growing and developing your career, so we are able to help you with dedicated support and a domestic relocation package.
